entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
